Text:
Okay, this is LOL and fuckin' great! I am a guitarist but ave been playing piano forever, this is gonna get interesting : )
Cheers and up the irons!
Awesome! For anybody that downloads it an wants to listen to it with iTunes, make sure your Sound Enhancer in the preferences is turned off or all at "Low." It sounds terrible otherwise.

Review from a Maiden fan:  

There's just a single piano on all these recordings, no drums or other instruments (could have been released in MIDI format to save space!).

The piano renditions of the guitar solos are simply AMAZING and worth the download, especially if you're a musician as well as a Maiden fan... but during the lengthy verse sections it just tries to follow Bruce's original vocal melody - which gets tedious... quickly.

Thanx pilostar- For both of these Maiden Tribute discs, any chance you have the newest maiden? if you upload it iam happy to seed it for ya, seems to be a little lacking here. Whats wrong with you people an all chick maiden tribute & no bodys seeding? Really?!
